title: Scrub Meadow
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. Lush, green grasses wave gently in the wind. Wildflowers grow among the grasses. The grasses range in height from less than a meter to nearly two meters tall in places. The land is gently sloped up to the north, gently sloped up to the east, flat to the south, gently sloped down to the west.
